title: FS: T206 Tolstoi HOME RUN BAKER - 1 of 1 - SGC 60 (REDUCED)
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Tolstoi HOME RUN BAKER - 1 of 1 - SGC 60 (REDUCED)
posts.post_content: Tough front/back combo. This is the only Tolstoi Baker to be issued a grade of SGC 60, so this card is one of one, with only one graded higher (SGC 80). For comparison purposes, there is also one PSA 5 and one PSA 6 version, but none higher than that. Asking $700 delivered; PayPal preferred. This is not a reverse auction, so snag it before it goes to eBay.
It's a TOLSTOI . . . a tough back of a major HOFer, with a grade of "Excellent" to boot. Good chance to pick up a fantastic card.
